title: Çigköftem - Karl-Marx
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Turkish
description: Part of an international Turkish fast food chain offering Turkish fast food, this one is near U7-Rathaus Neukolln. The vegan kofte and burger are served with a house-made sauce and fresh herbs. Small bistro with three tables inside and two tables outside. Oct 2015 reported food is all vegan. The only non-vegan item may be a drink with yogurt.
